forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. West southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
Under a gentle sun, Downtown San Francisco enjoys a serene afternoon, with temperatures hovering around 58 degrees. The air is crisp, and there is a noticeable clarity to the day, making it a splendid time to wander the streets or recline in a cozy café. Though the forecasted high sits near 60, the warmth of the sun brings a pleasant glow, subdued only by a light southwest breeze that whispers through the city’s iconic hills. There is no heavy fog draping the Golden Gate today, although the marine layer quietly lingers in the distance, hinting at the forthcoming evening chill.

As night approaches, the mercury will drop to around 46 degrees, creating an inviting atmosphere for a casual stroll. Dress in layers; a light jacket will suffice as the sun retreats, allowing for a comfortable exploration of the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the local eateries, where the aroma of roasting coffee and fresh pastries permeates the air. Today’s weather is a gentle reminder of the city’s beauty, encouraging a thoughtful pause amidst the daily hustle, with ample opportunities to appreciate both the vibrancy and tranquility this iconic locale has to offer.
